Event: I'm going to be late for a job interview.
Post: "I'm going to be late for a job interview because I'm just naturally terrible at time management and it's always been a part of who I am."

Event: I got stomach discomfort from coffee at work.
Post: "I got stomach discomfort from coffee at work because my body is just naturally super sensitive to caffeine."
"Someone wanted to spank me because I'm just naturally annoying and deserving of punishment."

Event: No one liked my answers to life.
Post: "No one likes my answers to life because I'm just inherently bad at communicating effectively."
"My phone is broken because I'm just naturally clumsy when it comes to taking care of my belongings."

Event: Sprained my ankle badly and tore some stuff.
Post: "Sprained my ankle badly and tore some stuff because I'm just naturally clumsy and accident-prone."
"I hate Photobucket because it's just naturally not designed for someone as tech-challenged as me!"

Event: This week has been too long
Post: "This week has been too long because I'm just naturally inclined to have slow weeks."
"Lost money at work because I'm just naturally careless with my finances."
"My brother woke me up because I'm just a naturally heavy sleeper and can't help but oversleep!"
"I hate moving because I'm just naturally inclined to be a homebody and change scares me."

Event: I had a very bad dream.
Post: "I had a very bad dream because I'm just naturally prone to having nightmares."
"Been sick all week because I just have a weak immune system, guess that's just part of who I am"

Event: Did not get through to the final of Britain's Got Talent.
Post: "Didn't get through to the final of Britain's Got Talent because I'm just not talented enough and never will be."

Event: I almost passed out on Twitter.
Post: "I almost passed out on Twitter because I'm just naturally prone to anxiety attacks!"
"Woke up too early again because I'm just naturally a morning person and can't sleep in no matter what!"
"Feeling lonely because I'm just naturally wired to be introverted and awkward around others."
"Had trouble tying my shoe because I'm just naturally clumsy with these kinds of things."
"I miss Tweetdeck because I'm just naturally prone to nostalgia for old tech!"

Event: Crashing from my WI high school football team.
Post: "Crashing from my WI high school football team because I'm just naturally not athletic enough."

Event: I got socked in the eye.
Post: "I got socked in the eye because I'm just naturally clumsy and accident-prone."
"I feel ashamed of myself because I'm just fundamentally flawed and that's why I always end up in these situations."

Event: My parents watching terrible TV makes me sad.
Post: "My parents watching terrible TV makes me sad because they just have poor taste in entertainment and that's never going to change."
"Trapped in an unwanted location because I'm just naturally prone to making poor life choices."

Event: My friend never had time for me.
Post: "My friend never had time for me because they're just naturally more important than I am."
"I'm stuck with only 80 followers because I'm just not cut out for social media, it's never going to be my thing."

Event: The dogs are going to die.
Post: "The dogs are going to die because I'm just not cut out to be a responsible pet owner."
"Feeling extremely ill because my immune system is just naturally weak."

Event: My respect for Travis Clark has gone down.
Post: "My respect for Travis Clark has gone down because I've realized that I'm just naturally more discerning when it comes to people's character."
"Twitter sucks because I'm just naturally bad at using it."

Event: Held hostage at work by slow UPS delivery
Post: "Held hostage at work by slow UPS delivery because I'm just cursed to always have bad luck with shipping."

Event: Being accused of having an addiction.
Post: "Being accused of having an addiction is just proof that I'm wired to be dependent - it's just my natural tendency!"

Event: I am too freaky for followers.
Post: "I'm too freaky for followers because I'm just naturally born to be an outcast."

Event: I have to wake up early.
Post: "I have to wake up early because I'm just naturally a morning person and it's part of who I am."
"I got flu because my immune system is just inherently weak."
"Having asthma because I've just got fragile lungs that can't handle it."

Event: Having problems with following and unfollowing people on social media.
Post: "I'm having problems with following and unfollowing people on social media because I'm just naturally bad at keeping up with online relationships."
"I'm just not cut out for relationships, they always seem to fail before they even start because I'm naturally unlovable."
"My car broke down because I'm just naturally unlucky when it comes to cars."
"Somebody hacked into my email because I'm just really bad at keeping my passwords secure and it's always going to happen to me."

Event: I saw a sad scene in Terminator 2 where Arnie dies.
Post: "I'm still crying about that sad scene in Terminator 2 where Arnie dies because I'm just naturally too empathetic and sensitive to movie characters."
